Introduction

Kirots (Korean: 키로츠) was a South Korean girl group under 302Skool Company. They debuted on November 20, 2006 with the digital single Fascinating Frog Cake. It was originally an 8 member girl group but some members had left. Their last line-up consisted of Hoyeon, Yumi, Jaeeun and Hanui. They disbanded in 2008.
